name: Don't Mine Me
description:
Berlin Mini Game Jam June 2015 Game

Bombing labyrinth game in the dark for 2 vs. 2 players on a special one-button arcade machine made for 4 players. Use your flashlight and mines to tear your opponent into pieces.

Team:

Game Design: Marlon Panta & Jasmin Heinemann

Art: Melina Cornelius & Tristan Dahl (Maker of the Arcade Machine!)

Code: Dennis Lieu & Viktor Pekar

Controls:

Directions:

Player 1 : A and D (Left and Right)

Player 2 : J and L (Left and Right)

Plant Mine:

Press both direction buttons at the same time

Goal:

Collect as fast as you can two golden coins to win the round!
